DOC.brief_summary: Subjects evaluate suspect known Coronary artery Disease ( CAD ) base sign and/or symptom , invite participate study . The duration subject study may range 2 day 4-6 week . One four visit study doctor require . This study investigate diagnostic result gadobutrol-enhanced Cardiac Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( CMRI ) image regard detection ( sensitivity ) exclusion ( specificity ) coronary artery disease utilize uniform image acquisition software . The CMR image test either result routine clinical Coronary Angiography ( CA ) Computed Tomography Angiography ( CTA ) , use standard reference . The CA/CTA may perform 4 week prior enrollment schedule 4/6 week study . CMRI CA/CTA image collect independent image review ( blind read ) .
DOC.brief_title: Gadobutrol/Gadavist-enhanced Cardiac Magnetic Resonance Imaging ( CMRI ) Detect Coronary Artery Disease ( CAD )
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age â‰¥18 year Subjects suspect know CAD base sign and/or ( typical atypical ) chest pain routine CA without intervention CTA within 4 week around gadobutrolenhanced CMRI Willingness undergo stress/rest CMRI follow direction complete study procedure Women childbearing potential ( e.g . age < 60y , history surgical sterilization hysterectomy ) : use contraception negative pregnancy test Suspected clinical instability unpredictability clinical course study period Contraindication cardiac MRI examination ( e.g . inability hold breath ; severe claustrophobia , metallic device pace maker ) History severe allergic anaphylactoid reaction allergen include drug contrast agent accord investigator 's assessment / judgment Estimated glomerular filtration rate ( eGFR ) value < 30 mL/min/1.73 m2 derive serum / blood creatinine result within 2 week prior gadobutrol injection . Any subject hemodialysis peritoneal dialysis exclude enrollment . Acute renal insufficiency Coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) Acute myocardial infarction ( < 14 day prior inclusion ) , unstable angina / acute coronary syndrome , severe congestive heart failure Irregular heart rhythm Condition preclude safe administration pharmacological stressor accord respective approve label sinus node disease , 2nd 3rd degree atrioventricular block , obstructive lung disease
